entry.title: $2275 // NO FEE - Renovated 2 bedroom apartment in Park Slope South for rent
entry.content:
NO FEE

Quiet, accessible, and historic Greenwood has a new gem available now! This apartment was recently renovated with beautiful new cabinets and new appliances. There is also lots of natural sunlight pouring into your new apartments well as unlimited charm to keep you happy. You will be pleased with your choice from the day you move in!
The R train at 25th St is just a short walk from your front door. There are plenty of restaurants, shops, laundry, markets, and other modes of transportation available for your convenience. Contact me now for more info and to schedule a viewing today! Sorry no pets

PLEASE INCLUDE YOUR NUMBER SO I CAN REACH BACK TO YOU TO SET UP AN APPOINTMENT

Where is this apartment in relation to other neighborhoods?
North of Bay Ridge, Sunset Park
South of Clinton Hill, Fort Greene, and Downtown Brooklyn
East of Red Hook, Carroll Gardens, Gowanus, Cobble Hill, Boerum Hill
West of Windsor Terrace and Prospect Heights
Greenwood Heights 11232
